nodes.title: Lyrics and Artist Insights
nodes.description: I'm a huge music nerd, so having lyrics available and learning more about the artists I love right in Podders would make my listening sessions even more enjoyable

nodes.title: Exclusive Music Content
nodes.description: I'm always looking for new and exclusive content. If Podders offered unique releases or artist interviews that I couldn't get anywhere else, I'd be more engaged and excited to use the app

nodes.title: Lossless Audio Quality Option
nodes.description: As an audiophile, I'd love to have the option for lossless audio quality on Podders. It would make a huge difference in my listening experience, especially with my high-end audio setup.

nodes.title: Advanced Music Discovery Tools
nodes.description: I wish Podders could help me discover new music more intuitively. Features like mood-based playlists and AI recommendations tailored to my tastes would be amazing additions to the platform.

nodes.title: Please create a mobile app
nodes.description: Would be nice to be able to upload my podcast episodes on the mobile app

nodes.title: Podcast Integration
nodes.description: I'd love for Podders to become my go-to app for podcasts as well as music. Having everything in one place, along with personalized podcast recommendations, would be so convenient.
